org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.overlays
Class DomainBarMarker

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.overlays.DomainBarMarker
All Implemented Interfaces:
GssElement, Overlay, org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable
public class DomainBarMarker
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.timepedia.exporter.client.Exportable, Overlay, GssElement

An overlay which renders highlighted regions spanning the entire Y dimensions of the plot over a given domain region
